## EditorPluginProps.renderIntoSettings() method

Allows the plugin to render into the plugin settings

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

| Parameter | Type                         | Description       |
| --------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------- |
| children  | <code>React.ReactNode</code> | content to render |
